CONTACT US
----------

14999 Darrington Rd  
Horizon City, TX 79928  
(915)852-1046  
Monday – Thursday,  7:00am to 6:00pm – City Hall Closed on Fridays.  
(Closed for lunch 11:45am to 1:00pm)

[Holidays Observed](http://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/Holidays.pdf)

[Frequently Asked Questions](https://www.horizoncity.org/faqs/)

**In accordance with the Texas Public Information Act, Public Information requests must be submitted in writing. Please use the link below for requests for records from The Town of Horizon City. Upon receipt, the City will begin processing your request. Please note that it can take up to 10 days to provide the requested information**

[Open Records Request Form](https://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/Open-Records-Request-Form-116500.pdf)

Your Name (required)

Your Email (required)

Subject

PID No. (for property related questions)

Your Message
